alert.note: Alert for Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 12:34PM PST until December 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of one to two feet possible, mainly above 5,000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Yosemite NP outside of the valley, Upper San Joaquin River, Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge and Kings Canyon NP Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 10 PM PST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
